sense.gloss: stock company, corporation, kabushiki kaisha, KK
member of a corporation, company stockholder (esp. in legal contexts)
one's company, company one works for
head office, main office, headquarters, parent company
joining a company, getting a job with a company, starting work at a company
going to work (e.g. in the morning), coming to work
leaving work (e.g. at the end of the day)
company name, name of a company
regular employee, permanent employee, full-time employee
x: 派遣社員・はけんしゃいん

sense.gloss: regional Chinese god of the earth (or a village built in its honour)

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑反↑↓はん↓↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓↑的↑↓てき↓かもしれないけれど↑人↑↓ひと↓と↑話↑↓はな↓さないわけではない。
